alert.note: Alert for Leon; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 1:18PM CDT until May 18 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Navasota River Near Easterly affecting Leon and Robertson Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navasota River Near Easterly. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur from below Easterly to below Highway 21. Cattle in the flood plain could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.6 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
